name: Concrete Technology Lab
description: Placeholder description for Construction Materials Lab.

equipment.name: Digital Rebound Hammer
equipment.specifications: Measures concrete compressive strength in the range of 10-100 N/mm². Operates at temperatures between 0-50°C. Conforms to ASTM C805 and BS 1881: Part 202.

equipment.name: Ultrasonic Pulse Wave Tester
equipment.specifications: Performs online data acquisition, waveform analysis, and pulse velocity measurements. Includes remote control features and crack depth analysis.

equipment.name: Concrete Permeability Apparatus
equipment.specifications: Three-cell permeability tester for 150mm cube specimens. Includes a steel mold, metal cylinder, removable cover plate, and funnel.

equipment.name: V Funnel Apparatus
equipment.specifications: Stainless-steel V-shaped frame with a watertight sliding gate. Includes a hopper with top opening 515mm x 75mm, bottom opening 65mm x 75mm, and a tapered height of 450mm.

equipment.name: J Ring Apparatus
equipment.specifications: Complete stainless-steel setup with 16 single rods (20mm dia). Includes a 300mm diameter ring, 10mm rods, and a 700mm x 700mm base plate.

equipment.name: Core Cutting Machine
equipment.specifications: Can cut cores up to 100mm diameter. 1100W motor operates on 220V AC. Includes drill bit barrels of 75mm and 100mm dia.

equipment.name: Accelerated Curing Tank
equipment.specifications: Holds up to 12 concrete cubes (70.6mm size). Provides accelerated curing up to 100 ± 2°C. Conforms to IS: 9013.

equipment.name: Rapid Chloride Permeability Test Apparatus
equipment.specifications: Conforms to ASTM C1202-19, ASTM C1760-12, NT Build 492, AASHTO T 277, and EN 12390-18.

equipment.name: Large Scale 3D Concrete Printer
equipment.specifications: Operates with a noise level of max 70 dB. Electrical connection: 200-600V, 50/60 Hz. Includes a water pump with 75-750 L/h capacity.

equipment.name: Rolling Thin Film Oven
equipment.specifications: Double-walled electrically heated convection oven with high-density fiber glass insulation. Conforms to ASTM D2872, AASHTO T240, EN 12607-1, IS 15799-2008.

equipment.name: Vacuum Pycnometer for Rice Test
equipment.specifications: Large capacity vacuum pycnometer with oil-free vacuum pump, regulating valve, moisture trap, and silicon tubing. Conforms to ASTM D2041, AASHTO T209, and AASHTO T283.

equipment.name: Indirect Tensile Test Jig - 6 inch
equipment.specifications: Lottman breaking head for tensile splitting tests on 150mm diameter compacted bituminous samples. Conforms to ASTM D6931.

equipment.name: Rotational Viscometer
equipment.specifications: Measures viscosity with spindle options for different volume ranges. RPM range: 0.01 to 250, torque range: up to 1.5 mNm. Conforms to EN 13302, ASTM D2196, ASTM D4402, AASHTO T316.

equipment.name: CORELOK
equipment.specifications: Determines bulk gravity, maximum gravity, porosity, permeability, and absorption of asphalt and aggregates. Conforms to ASTM D6752, D6857, D7063, and D7370.

equipment.name: Dynamic Shear Rheometer
equipment.specifications: Direct current synchronous motor with wide angular frequency range. Measures normal force, torque rotation, and oscillation. Conforms to AASHTO, ASTM, DIN EN, and FGSV standards.

equipment.name: Gyratory Compactor
equipment.specifications: Electromechanical model for compacted specimens of Ø 100mm and 150mm, with adjustable gyratory angle and vertical load. Conforms to research mode testing standards.

equipment.name: Laboratory Drilling Machine
equipment.specifications: Includes three drill bits (52mm, 102mm, 152mm). Operates on 230V power with adjustable RPM across three gears. Suitable for pavement and concrete core drilling.

equipment.name: Cutting Saw Machine
equipment.specifications: Diamond blade with 450mm diameter for cutting concrete, rock, and asphalt specimens. Operates on 380V/50-60Hz/3ph.

equipment.name: UTM 16-16 KN
equipment.specifications: Universal testing machine for resilient modulus, indirect tensile fatigue, semi-circular bending, and cyclic compression tests. Conforms to ASTM and AASHTO standards.

equipment.name: Light Weight Deflectometer
equipment.specifications: Measures pavement deflection with a drop weight system. Includes adjustable load plates (100mm, 150mm, 300mm) and loading range >15kN. Conforms to ASTM E2583.

equipment.name: Core Drilling Machine
equipment.specifications: Core cutter for up to 150mm diameter cores. Three-speed drill with RPM options (460, 760, 1690). Operates on a rig-based system for pavement and concrete.

equipment.name: Steel Bar/Concrete Scanner
equipment.specifications: Uses dual polarization antennas (HH, VV) for shallow and deep rebar detection. Integrated multi-touch color display with advanced laser-based positioning.

equipment.name: Heavy-Duty Laboratory Mixer for Bitumen
equipment.specifications: High-speed bitumen shear mixer with digital tachometer, ammeter, and timer. Stirring speed up to 10,000 RPM with a temperature range of ambient to 300°C.

equipment.name: Wet and Dry Double Wheel Tracker
equipment.image: /images/Wet and dry double wheel tracker controls.png
equipment.specifications: Conforms to AASHTO T324, EN 12697-22, and DOT methods. Adjustable wheel speed (20-30 cycles/min), temperature control up to 80°C, and high-accuracy rut depth measurement.

equipment.name: Force Ductility Tester
equipment.specifications: Tests three specimens simultaneously with a tension line up to 1500mm. Speed adjustable from 5mm/min to 100mm/min, with 300N load cells.

equipment.name: Drop Shape Analysis System
equipment.specifications: Measures contact angle (0° - 180°) with 0.1° accuracy and interfacial tensions from 0.01 - 2000 mN/m. Uses Young-Laplace model for analysis.

equipment.name: Automatic Oedometer Apparatus
equipment.specifications: Performs consolidation tests as per ASTM D2435, ASTM D3877, ASTM D4546, AASHTO T216, BS 1377:5, and EN 17892:5. Includes a 20 kN capacity load cell and 10 mm displacement transducers.

equipment.name: Automatic Direct and Residual Shear Machine
equipment.specifications: Motorized microprocessor-based system with a 200kg capacity. Uses an S-shaped LVDT with a ±20mm stroke and repeatability of ±0.1% of rated capacity. Conforms to IS: 2720 Part XIII.

equipment.name: Swell Pressure Test Apparatus
equipment.specifications: Includes a hand-operated 5000 kg capacity loading unit, 100mm dia gunmetal mould, perforated swell plate, spacer, and two porous stones. Used for determining soil swelling pressure.

equipment.name: Cyclic Simple Shear System
equipment.specifications: Performs cyclic shear tests conforming to ASTM D6528. Features a simple shear load frame with servo-controlled actuators, two 5 kN load cells, and a ±15mm displacement transducer. Sample size: 70mm (convertible to 50mm). Operating frequency: up to 10 Hz.

equipment.name: Plate Load Test Apparatus
equipment.specifications: Hand-operated hydraulic jack (500 kN), hydraulic pump with 200 mm dia load gauge, high-pressure flexible metallic pipe (5m), and ball and socket steel plate arrangement. Conforms to IS: 1888.

equipment.name: In-Situ Vane Shear Apparatus
equipment.specifications: Used for determining shear strength of cohesive soils in the field. Includes a torque applicator with a 200 N.m capacity and accuracy of 2.5 N.m. Vane sizes: 37.5 mm x 75 mm and 50 mm x 100 mm. Conforms to IS: 4434.

equipment.name: Geosynthetics Pull Out Test Apparatus
equipment.specifications: Measures pull-out resistance of geosynthetics as per ASTM D6706-01. Features a 200 kN normal load, 100 kN pull-out load, static strain rate of 0.1-100 mm/min, and a pull-out box of 1000mm x 1000mm x 700mm. Includes two load cells and four displacement transducers.

equipment.name: 3D Printer for Polymers
equipment.specifications: Uses fused deposition modeling (FDM) technology. Build volume: 500mm x 500mm x 500mm, dimensional tolerance: ±0.2mm, print speed: 40-120 mm/sec, and extruder temperature up to 300°C.
